name: PapaRayRadio
0:
”Alexa, start Papa Ray Radio”
”Alexa, play Papa Ray Radio”
”Alexa, ask Papa Ray Radio what is the current song”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: papa ray radio
des: "Producer and composer for WELCH Kitchen Studio Audio and Video Productions, Ryukyu Innovations. Prior host for a radio show on FM Uruma, Okinawa, titled "Real Eigo with Papa Ray" (2-1/2 years) promoting English as a Second Language through Music and Idioms, and Verb Communications. Presently, produce and Host a radio program on Live365 promoting Motivation and learning values, titled "Salt and Pepper Soul, Philadelphia" and "Real Eigo with Papa Ray", Japanese English Education through Music, Idioms and Slang and creation of AI composed music. Ojiisan Radio Okinawa is a mix of music and talk for all ages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
